name: Apple Dapple Cake
steps: Cream butter and sugar. Add eggs until fluffy. Shred apples and mix with butter mixture. Combine all dry ingredients and sift. Add to wet mixture and fold together. Pour into bundt cake and bake at 325 for 50-60 min.
Sauce: Starting with 1 c. butter. Dissolve in saucepan. Pour over individual pieces of cake. Serve with ice cream.
